attributes.action: MAKE A PUBLIC STATEMENT (that's the action we want him to take!) to explain why this country continues to hand out thousands of passports to foreigners while it refuses to give a passport to a 17 year old schoolboy (born of british born parents who have never been outside of the UK) because he cannot produce his mother's birth certificate - she left the family home when he was FIVE years old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
